name: Avery's Adventure Return of The dog
name_original: Avery's Adventure Return of The dog
description:
The epic sequel to Avery's Adventure!

The dog has used the respawn button and escaped. He is now planning an evil comeback and rumors says that he has created a zombie-creating-maschine. You need to help Avery so she can kill The dog and get her final revenge for her grandma.

Avery's Adventure RoTd brings an amazing story, better graphics and gameplay to the series.

Learn more about the series at the official website: https://averysadventuregame.weebly.com/
